◆ Furnace Notify ◆Receive actionbar with the progress of the furnace when you look at furnace.
furnace.reload = 允许你重载配置文件.furnace.notify = 允许你接收熔炉通知.furnace.disableworld = 允许你使用 /furnace disableworld 指令.furnace.info = 允许你使用 /furnace info 指令.furnace.toggle = 允许你开启或关闭熔炉通知, 感谢 @Zedwick 提出的建议!furnace.toggle.exempt = 一般的用户无法使用 /furnace toggle on ，你可以给他们 furnace.toggle.bypass 权限.furnace.toggle.bypass = 允许你绕过 furnace.toggle.exempt 权限.furnace.toggle.others = 允许你对其他玩家使用 /furnace toggle 指令.furnace.plotbypass = allow you to receive the actionbar even if you are not the owner or the member of the plot.furnace.factionbypass = allow you to receive the actionbar even if you are not the leader or the member of the faction.furnace.skyblockbypass = allow you to receive the actionbar even if you are not the leader or the member of the island.furnace.cooldownbypass = 允许你绕过冷却时间.
注意！权限可在配置文件中更改，以上是缺省权限。
/furnace reload = 重载配置文件.
/furnace toggle = 切换通知显示，关闭后将不会收到通知.
/furnace info = 你可以收到关于玩家的一些信息，例如：/furnace disableworld = 你可以选择要禁用是世界，禁用的世界将无法使用熔炉通知，例如：/furnace disableplayer = 你可以选择要关闭的玩家，关闭的玩家将无法使用熔炉通知，例如：

注意！！你可以自己在配置文件中改变GUI面板中玻璃板的颜色！
可用的颜色： 
White, Orange, Magenta, Yellow, Lime, Pink, Gray, Cyan, Purple, Blue, Brown, Green, Red and Black.例如：
CooldownEnabled = 启用或禁用 /furnace toggle 指令的冷却时间CooldownTime = 冷却时间，单位为秒
注意！每个消息都可以在配置文件中更改
{Prefix} = 替换config中的前缀.{PlayerName} = 替换玩家名.{PlayerDisplayName} = 替换玩家昵称.{PlayerIP} = 替换玩家IP.{PlayerX} = 替换 X 方位.{PlayerY} = 替换 Y 方位.{PlayerZ} = 替换 Z 方位.{PlayerUUID} = 替换玩家uuid.{ServerName} = 替换服务器名.{ServerIP} = 替换服务器IP.{PlayerXP} = 替换玩家经验等级.{PlayerGamemode} = 替换玩家游戏模式.{PlayerHealth} = 替换玩家血量.{World} = 替换世界名.{CookTime} = 替换剩余时间.{SmeltItemAmount} = 替换熔炉中物品的数量.{SmeltItem} = 替换熔炉中物品的名字.{Fuel} = 替换燃料名字.{FuelAmount} = 替换剩余燃料的数量.
